author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sharing Economy International Says EC Technology & Innovations Entered Into A Letter Agreement With BM Nine
text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Sharing Economy International Inc :
* SHARING ECONOMY INTERNATIONAL- ‚ÄçON JANUARY 18, 2018, EC TECHNOLOGY & INNOVATIONS LIMITED ENTERED INTO A LETTER AGREEMENT WITH BM NINE LIMITED
* SHARING ECONOMY INTERNATIONAL-TO ACQUIRE 15.6 MILLION ORDINARY VOTING SHARES OF COASSETS LTD VALUED AT AU$5 MILLION FOR 535,584 SHARES OF CO'S COMMON STOCK Source text : ( bit.ly/2BmYMFM ) Further company coverage:
